---
title: Send Notification
---

```typescript
import { whopApi } from "@/lib/whop-api";

const result = await whopApi.sendNotification({
	// Required! Autogenerated input type of SendNotification
	input: {
		companyTeamId: "biz_XXXXXXXX",
		// Required!
		content: "some string",
		experienceId: "exp_XXXXXXXX",
		externalId: "some string",
		isMention: true,
		link: "some string",
		senderUserId: "user_XXXXXXXX",
		subtitle: "some string",
		// Required!
		title: "some string",
		// Required!
		userIds: ["user_XXXXXXXX"],
	},
});

```
